column1: Pithampur is a town in the Dhar district of Madhya Pradesh
column2: India. Pithampur is an industrial city
column3: and is a part of Indore Metropolitan Region. Presently called the 'Detroit of India'
column4: Pithampur houses major industries and companies of Madhya Pradesh.
099. Males constitute 58% of the population and females 42%. Pithampur has an average literacy rate of 62%
column5: higher than the national average of 59.5%:- male literacy is 73%
column6: and female literacy is 47%. In Pithampur
column7: 18% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: Pithampur has an Industrial area. Parts of Pithampur Industrial area hosts several Large Scale Industries / Public Sector Undertakings.
